entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who is speaking to Harry and trying to reason with Draco. He is described as 'my dear boy' by Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being imprisoned within his own invisible body and unable to move or act.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as the one who is being spoken to by Dumbledore and is described as not being a killer.

relationships.description: Dumbledore tries to reason with Draco Malfoy, telling him that he is not a killer.
Harry is imprisoned within his own invisible body by an unknown force.
